name: Chris Pierdominici
tweet: For those Microsoft Outlook users in the audience, make sure to do an updates check immediately, there was a very serious Zero Day exploit found in Outlook warranting immediate patching -  https://t.co/H8vHVwUpoz

name: CloudTech24
tweet: On Tuesday last week, Microsoft released details of a critical vulnerability present in its Outlook platform.   https://t.co/Oz1bpJinK7  #microsoftsecurity #microsoft365 #microsoft #mssp #cve #securityoperationscenter #vulnerabilitymanagement  https://t.co/4Pj4xYmZ3a

name: Jason Cobine
tweet: Upgrade asap as zero day vulnerability is found in Microsoft Outlook. The software giant has pushed out fixes for at least 80 Windows flaws with special attention to CVE-2023-23397, a critical-severity issue that has been exploited in zero-day attacks.  https://t.co/ya8dgDRPpd
